code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var cartSelector=function cartSelector(state){return state.cart;};export var cartItemSelector=createSelector([cartSelector],function(cart){return cart.cartItem;});export var hiddenSelector=createSelector([cartSelector],function(cart){return cart.hidden;});export var itemCountSelector=createSelector([cartItemSelector],function(cartItem){return cartItem.reduce(function(need,cartItem){return need+cartItem.quantity;},0);});export var itemPriceSelector=createSelector([cartItemSelector],function(cartItem){return cartItem.reduce(function(need,cartItem){return need+cartItem.quantity*cartItem.price;},0);});
